item.title: Visual Studio 2013 Update 1 Released
item.description: Visual Studio 2013 Update 1 has been released and as usual you are able to use the /layout argument to download all the files so you can share them locally instead of everyone downloading them. As mentioned in Brian Harry's blog here there is no update for TFS this time round but good things are coming for TFS Update 2.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
